name: poweroff
body:
- - -

I am Mengyang Li(李梦阳) aka `mayli`, 25yrs old, programmer, from Tianjin, China, living in Stony Brook, New York.

I have a Computer Science bachelor degree at [NKU][nk] and now I am pursuing my masters degree at SUNYSB.

And here is my [Blog](http://blog.veryamt.com/).

# Services

enjoy:

- [mc 1.7.6]: Server: [veryamt.com:25565](veryamt.com:25565), [dynmap](http://dj.veryamt.com), US, public
- [mc 1.8.0]: Server: [mc.veryamt.com:25565](mc.veryamt.com:25565), [dynmap](http://mc.veryamt.com:2052), CN, *whitelisted*
- [altitudegame]: Server: aws.veryamt.com [27275-27280], public
- [iodined]: Server: t.veryamt.com, *ping me for password*
- [teamspeak3]: ts.veryamt.com, public
- [tracker]: [BitTorrent tracker](http://tracker.veryamt.com/)
- [podcast]: [radio2podcast](http://podcast.veryamt.com/), 天津人民广播电台

# Interested in

 - Linux Kernel
 - Network Application (Web&P2P)
 - Virtualization & Emulation
 - Data Visualization
 - Distributed Computing
 - Embedded Systems
